nodes.text: Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens?

Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens? is an article written by Mark Newbold on the Star Wars official site that gave the locations of the various worlds of the film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. It took information from the Legends source The Essential Atlas and the canon source Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Visual Dictionary.
